value.stringValue: ISNEW() && (TEXT([Payment_Request__c].Mode__c) = 'OTC Deposits' || TEXT([Payment_Request__c].Mode__c) = 'Cheque' || TEXT([Payment_Request__c].Mode__c) = 'Credit Card') && ISBLANK([Payment_Request__c].Booking__c ) && (TEXT([Payment_Request__c].Mode_Option__c) = 'Single Mode' || (TEXT([Payment_Request__c].Mode_Option__c) = 'Multi Mode' && NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT([Payment_Request__c].Secondary_Mode__c) ))))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: ISNEW() && (TEXT({!myVariable_current.Mode__c}) = 'OTC Deposits' || TEXT({!myVariable_current.Mode__c}) = 'Cheque' || TEXT({!myVariable_current.Mode__c}) = 'Credit Card') && ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Booking__c} ) && (TEXT({!myVariable_current.Mode_Option__c}) = 'Single Mode' || (TEXT({!myVariable_current.Mode_Option__c}) = 'Multi Mode' && NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.Secondary_Mode__c}) ))))

value.stringValue: ISNEW() && (TEXT([Payment_Request__c].Mode__c) = 'CDM Cash' || TEXT([Payment_Request__c].Mode__c) = 'CDM Cheque' || TEXT([Payment_Request__c].Mode__c) = 'International Wire Transfer' || TEXT([Payment_Request__c].Mode__c) = 'Domestic Wire Transfer') && ISBLANK([Payment_Request__c].Booking__c ) && (TEXT([Payment_Request__c].Mode_Option__c) = 'Single Mode' || (TEXT([Payment_Request__c].Mode_Option__c) = 'Multi Mode' && NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT([Payment_Request__c].Secondary_Mode__c) ))))
